snippet: Since becoming Giants coach in 2004, Tom Coughlin has lost three of the four matchups with New Orleans by a combined 127-58, including a 49-24 thrashing last season.
abstract: New York Giants are busy preparing for upcoming game against New Orleans Saints, who have defeated them in three of four matchups since Tom Coughlin became coach in 2004.
lead_paragraph: Since becoming Giants coach in 2004, Tom Coughlin has lost three of the four matchups with New Orleans by a combined 127-58, including a 49-24 thrashing last season.

headline.seo: Giants, on Their Turf, Will Try to Slow the Saints’ Fast-Paced Offense
headline.main: Giants, on Their Turf, Will Try to Slow the Saints’ Fast-Paced Offense
headline.print_headline: Giants, on Their Turf, Will Try to Slow the Saints’ Fast-Paced Offense
